page.title: 19Home Life - retired person
page.content: My name is{Mabel Whitham,}and I live in the small village of{Fritton. I live in a brick cottage on the edge of a{common}overlooking a pond inhabited by thirty{ducks.}My first chore of the day is making a pot of tea, then I tidy up my house and do any washing that is lying around. When the papers arrive I usually have a look at them and perhaps do the crossword. I then go round to help my sister who lives next door as she has poor eyesight. Then I have my lunch and gather vegetables from the garden as they come in season. After lunch I do some weeding, grass cutting in the garden. Later in the afternoon I take my dog for a walk. At about 5.15 I have tea and then watch the news on the television.
